articles.author: Simon Bajkowski, Joe Bray, Daniel Murphy, Jack Flintham
articles.title: Man City vs Club America LIVE score and goal updates as Haaland on bench and Alvarez starts - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City take on Club America in their first friendly of pre-season in Houston in the early hours of Thursday morning.
articles.content:
Manchester City get their pre-season underway in the early hours of Thursday morning as they take on Club America in Houston.
City are returning back to action a lot later than their Premier League … [+679 chars]
